LanguageData.IncidentWorker_RTShortCircuit_PartialMit: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged, but {2} of it was mitigated by the fuses.
LanguageData.IncidentWorker_RTShortCircuit_FullMitiga: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged, but any serious damage was prevented by the fuses.
